name: Mustang Survival Re-Arm Kit (MA7114)
description: Re-arm your Mustang Survival DLX and Inflatable belt pack PFD.Contains a 33g CO2 cylinder, and an activation bobbin that fits either manual and automatic Type E inflatables.Also compatible with MD2051, MD2053, MD2085, MD2087, MD3051, MD3052, MD3053, MD3054, MD3071, MD3075, MD3081, MD3082, MD3083, MD3084, MD3085, and MD3087.
